text: Tachibana: "I just can't give up after all!"
Chibi, You: "On what?"
Tachibana: "On becoming strong!"
Chibi, You: "..."
Chibi, You: "..."
Chibi, You: "......"
You: "Hey, Tachibana... You realized it in the last boxing match, right? Basically, you're like a shallow jar—you can see the bottom right away. You know your limits at a glance..."
You: "But isn't that fine? Instead of getting strong, why don't you try arranging flowers? Let's make your own bouquet beautiful, not just strong..."
Chibi: "Yeah, sis... You're like a 1cm ruler. You can only measure up to 1cm. But that's fine, right? Not knowing how much you can measure—it's actually pretty harsh..."
Chibi: "Not knowing how far you need to go can be cruel. Now you know you don't have to spend time trying to get stronger. That's a good thing."
Tachibana: "Ugh... Why do you both try to stop me with weird analogies..."
Tachibana: "But! There was something else I learned from that last boxing match! My form is good! I'm not clumsy or anything!"
Chibi: "That's true... You're not uncoordinated or anything. You're just incredibly weak. Maybe that means you've got no hidden potential left."
Tachibana: "Exactly! So what if I just work out and build some muscle?"
You: "Yeah, that's the logical conclusion... But when will you actually be able to do a sit-up? You haven't even done one yet."
Tachibana: "But that's not a reason to give up!"
Chibi: "I'm moved!"
You: "Who are you?! Some random minister?"
Chibi: "That's right! On the flip side, if you just get stronger, you'll be fine! So let's check your baseline, sis!"
Tachibana: "If I remember right, these are the Ministry of Health's standards for 16-year-old girls."
You: "Who memorizes it down to the decimals..."
You: "Are you some kind of high school girl nerd?"
Chibi: "By the way, my sister can tell which school's uniform it is just by looking at it. Creepy, right?"
Tachibana: "This is the private Luca Academy uniform!"
Tachibana: "309 students! Academic score over 60! It's an all-girls school, of course!"
Tachibana: "Oh, and their soccer team's ace, Sayaka Kondo, was the top scorer at this year's All Japan High School Girls Soccer Championship! Six goals! She's 162cm, 47kg."
Tachibana: "I even know her Insta, X, YouTube, email, family, address, and her family registry!"
Tachibana: "Want them?"
You: "No!"
You: "It's okay when you know, but if I knew, I'd be an actual criminal."
Chibi: "Your sense of normal is messed up. Actually, even my sister's a criminal."
You: "How do you know so much anyway?"
Tachibana: "Hmm..."
Tachibana: "Noblesse oblige. I just have a duty as the privileged, you know."
You: "Nobody has that kind of duty."
Chibi: "Anyway..."
Chibi: "Still, looking at these fitness scores..."
Chibi: "They're pretty low."  Tachibana: "They're actually pretty high."
Chibi, Tachibana: "Huh?"
Well, Tachibana is just too weak... and Chibi's crazy strong. No wonder it feels so off.
Tachibana: "Since we're at it, why don't we all try? I want to see how amazing Chibi really is! You too!"

Chibi: "Guess I don't have a choice... Hey, you—"
You: "...?"
Chibi: "You... Go easy on her, okay...?"
Chibi: "If both of us beat her up, it won't just be triple fried rice... She'll turn into a fried rice machine."
Chibi: "There was even a time with quadruple fried rice... It went beyond that..."
You: "...Got it."
Chibi: "Alright! Let's do this!"
